jma::JMA_Analyzer

jma::JMA_Analyzer Class Reference

JMA_Analyzer executes the Japanese morphological analysis based on conditional random field. More...

#include <jma_analyzer.h>

Detailed Description

JMA_Analyzer executes the Japanese morphological analysis based on conditional random field.

bool jma::JMA_Analyzer::runNBest ( Sentence &  sentence,
int  nbest 
) const

Execute the n-best morphological analysis based on a sentence.

Parameters:
sentence the instance containing the raw sentence string and also to save the analysis result
nbest the n-best value, which is at least 2
Returns:
true for success, false for fail
Precondition:
the raw sentence string could be got by sentence.getString().
Postcondition:
on successful return, the n-best results could be got by sentence.getListSize(), etc.
Attention:
white-space characters are ignored in the analysis, which include " \t\n\v\f\r", and also space character in specific encoding.

Execute the morphological analysis based on a sentence.

sentence the instance containing the raw sentence string and also to save the analysis result
Returns:

the raw sentence string could be got by sentence.getString().
Postcondition:
